price: O te acusan diciendo: "Es un poeta, esperemos a que le llegue la muerte".
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ
footnotes: Y así nos libraremos de él.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
